mapper.select: select m.*, (select count(*) from board b where b.MEMBER_INDEX = m.MEMBER_INDEX ) as board_cnt, (select count(*) from comment c where c.MEMBER_INDEX = m.MEMBER_INDEX) as comment_cnt, (select count(*) from schedule s where s.MEMBER_INDEX = m.member_index) as schedule_cnt from member m order by m.MEMBER_INDEX desc
